doNotCallFlowComponent.TITLE: Add your phone number to the SiriusXM Do Not Call list
doNotCallFlowComponent.DESCRIPTION: This will stop SiriusXM from placing telemarketing calls to your phone number.
doNotCallFlowComponent.NOTE: Please note: You will still continue to receive important service messages by phone concerning your account.

HELP.TITLE: Need more help managing your contact preferences?
HELP.DESCRIPTION: Call 1-866-303-5603 or login to your account online to update your preferences.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Thank you.
DESCRIPTION: We have updated phone number {{phoneNumber}} with your request NOT TO call you with telemarketing calls.

Please be aware that you will still receive important service messages to this number.  It may take about 3-5 days to update our systems.  During that time, it is possible that you may receive a few more telemarketing calls due to campaigns still in progress.

ERROR.TITLE: We're Sorry.
ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Please call 1-866-303-5603 to speak with an agent and continue adding phone numbers to SiriusXM's Do Not Call list.
